Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Necklace combining round glass beads of different sizes, whose colours vary from green to black, with a few spherical and ring-shaped beads of turquoise enamel and three ring-shaped beads of dark blue glass. The largest one has a diametre of 1 cm.
